Package me.dessie.dessielib.particleapi.collison

Class EntityCollider

java.lang.Object
me.dessie.dessielib.particleapi.collison.ParticleCollider<org.bukkit.entity.Entity>
me.dessie.dessielib.particleapi.collison.EntityCollider
public class EntityCollider extends ParticleCollider<org.bukkit.entity.Entity>
A collider that is called whenever a particle collides with an entity in the world.

  • Method Details

    • attemptCollide

      protected void attemptCollide(ShapedParticle particle, org.bukkit.World world, List<org.bukkit.util.Vector> points)
      Description copied from class: ParticleCollider
      If you're writing your own Colliders for an object, you'll need to override this method. To call your Consumer, you can use Consumer.accept(Object)
      Specified by:
      attemptCollide in class ParticleCollider<org.bukkit.entity.Entity>
      Parameters:
      particle - The ShapedParticle that was rendered and could collide with something.
      world - The world that the ShapedParticle was rendered in.
      points - A list of particle locations within the rendered ShapedParticle.
